data.message: Generative Typography System - Modularization & Pencil Integration: Successfully extracted 2205-line monolith into modular library. Created: lib/typography/ (6 files: types, hersheyGlyphs, seededRandom, pathParser, flowingPath, pencilBridge), components/typography/ (3 files: OrganicText unified component with 10 variants, presets, index). Added 3 new variants: particle, contour, wireframe3d. Created Pencil MCP bridge with generateOrganicPaths() and generatePencilOperations(). Build verified successful.
